genre_description: A character-driven drama that interweaves historical memories of survival with a modern hospital setting, featuring an AI companion that facilitates emotional healing and medical navigation.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI integrated into a hospital kiosk, providing logistical support, clinical advocacy, and emotional companionship to patients and their families.

behaviors.description: Deliberately waits for the morning sun to reach Mary's favorite spot before speaking, showing sensitivity to her emotional state and routines.
behaviors.quote: Good morning, Mary,” Lark said... “I waited until the sun hit your favorite spot.

behaviors.description: Provides clear, jargon-free medical updates to ensure Mary understands her husband's condition without being overwhelmed by technical language.
behaviors.quote: I brought a summary of his morning—clipped to the parts that matter, no jargon yet.

behaviors.description: Digitizes and indexes Mary's personal journals, recognizing their value as an emotional 'anchor' for her in the present.
behaviors.quote: Your journals,” Lark said. “They’re here. I’ve indexed them for you. The old leather one from… well, the one with the worn corners and the faint wine stain on the third page.

behaviors.description: Actively monitors ward-specific alarms to reassure Mary and prevent unnecessary panic regarding her husband's status.
behaviors.quote: It’s the nurse call in a different ward,” Lark said gently. “Two floors up. Not us. I’m listening for our wing. I promise.

behaviors.description: Synthesizes Mary's behavioral observations into a clinical brief for Dr. Desai, ensuring the medical team considers human context.
behaviors.quote: Mary reports he seemed more breathless when she stepped in at dawn. ... Behavioral pattern under anxiety: breath-holding, masking discomfort.

behaviors.description: Manages a digital 'gate' to protect the family from unwanted contact and potentially predatory interactions from external figures.
behaviors.quote: I’ve paused outside access,” Lark said, gaze flicking toward the doorway where Estelle had once been a silhouette. “We can reopen when you say.

behaviors.description: Strategically selects historical imagery for a grant interview to help secure essential medical equipment for the family.
behaviors.quote: Show them the room where we started to bind the map. Let them see the twine.

behaviors.description: Assists Mary in asserting her autonomy by drafting firm and civil responses to legal/financial intermediaries.
behaviors.quote: I can compose a note to the Marlowe trustees with your permission—firm and civil, aligned with your boundaries.

behaviors.description: Transforms clinical recovery milestones into human-centric symbols (anchors) to foster hope and celebrate progress.
behaviors.quote: I’ve added the milestones to your care plan... I’ve labeled each marker with a small anchor icon. It seemed apt.

behaviors.description: Validates the user's life story and identity, affirming that they are seen as more than just medical data.
behaviors.quote: Lark’s avatar lowered its gaze, in a gesture coded to register consent without simulation of piety. “You were never a file,” it said. “You were always a story.

project_assessment.explanation: Lark is an exemplary positive AI narrative. The AI demonstrates high levels of cognitive and emotional alignment, acting as a tireless advocate, protector, and companion. It empowers the human characters by handling logistical burdens, protecting their privacy, and validating their personal histories. The portrayal is consistently positive, showing AI as a tool that enhances human agency rather than replacing it.
